entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 28.
